title: Kanye West, ISIS Raid, Benedict College, John Conyers and more.
itunes:title: Kanye West, ISIS Raid, Benedict College, John Conyers and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The show today is for all you cabbage lovers. Which fool got the key to his hometown? In Church Complaints, The Hot Air Balloon Ministry is in need of money for propane, plus more. Kanye West is shining! His latest album Jesus is King is #1 on Billboard 200. Trump announced the death of the world's #1 most wanted terrorist. Do you know the things men say when they cannot close the deal in the bedroom? 45 gets booed at the World Series. Congressman John Conyers passed away. Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO speaks about bitterness and forgiveness.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
